mapper.update: update user set user.UserAccount =#{UserAccount}, user.UserName=#{UserName}, user.UserPassword=#{UserPassword}, user.UserEmail=#{UserEmail}, user.UserPhone=#{UserPhone}, `user`.UserStatus=#{UserStatus}, `user`.Department=#{Department}, `user`.Position=#{Position}, `user`.CreateTime=#{CreateTime}, `user`.updateTime=#{UpdateTime} where `user`.UserId=#{UserId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.UserId, u.UserName, u.UserAccount, u.UserEmail, u.UserPhone, u.UserStatus, u.Department, u.Position, u.UpdateTime as updateTime, r.RoleType FROM user u INNER JOIN userrole ur ON u.UserId = ur.UserId INNER JOIN role r ON ur.RoleId = r.RoleId ORDER BY u.UserId ASC LIMIT #{currentPage}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM user INNER JOIN userrole ON user.UserId = userrole.UserId
SELECT UserId FROM user WHERE UserAccount = #{userAccount}
select role.RoleType from user left join userrole on userrole.UserId = `user`.UserId left join role on userrole.RoleId = role.RoleId where user.UserId=#{UserId}
mapper.insert: insert into user(UserName, UserAccount, UserPassword, UserEmail, UserPhone, UserStatus, Department, Position, CreateTime, UpdateTime) values(#{UserName}, #{UserAccount}, #{UserPassword}, #{UserEmail}, #{UserPhone}, #{UserStatus}, #{Department}, #{Position}, #{CreateTime}, #{UpdateTime})
insert into userrole(UserId, RoleId, CreateTime) values(#{UserId}, #{RoleId},#{CreateTime})
